05d98d78-e3a1-471a-b4d7-81cf2220ac40.name: Temperature
05d98d78-e3a1-471a-b4d7-81cf2220ac40.description: Monitoring temperature helps farmers adjust irrigation, planting, and harvesting schedules.

65fbe637-fb5d-45c3-823b-d3f6f85b23ea.name: Humidity
65fbe637-fb5d-45c3-823b-d3f6f85b23ea.description: Monitoring humidity helps farmers optimize irrigation practices.

20cba97f-b732-44f3-938d-1de103f89fd8.name: Soil Moisture
20cba97f-b732-44f3-938d-1de103f89fd8.description: The amount of water present in the soil.

0ac7fc22-eaac-4b55-8e41-808b304c7e43.name: Light Intensity
0ac7fc22-eaac-4b55-8e41-808b304c7e43.description: Measure the intensity of light, which is crucial for plant growth and can influence crop yield and quality.

df4f92d3-5ec4-4a0b-88c8-abf8840cf968.name: Nutrient Levels
df4f92d3-5ec4-4a0b-88c8-abf8840cf968.description: To ensure proper fertilization and address nutrient deficiencies or excesses.

b095e8e4-2a6f-4ddb-9a65-66db58b0a55a.name: Rainfall
b095e8e4-2a6f-4ddb-9a65-66db58b0a55a.description: Track rainfall amounts to manage irrigation and drainage systems and assess water availability for crops.

52747652-aa8c-4bec-b605-6591defd93ed.name: Wind Speed and Direction
52747652-aa8c-4bec-b605-6591defd93ed.description: Monitor wind speed and direction, which can affect crop pollination, irrigation, and pesticide application.
